play.libs.ws.ning

Class NingWSRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.libs.ws.ning.NingWSRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WSRequest

    public class NingWSRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements WSRequest
    provides the User facing API for building WS request.
